mapper.select: select order_num, item_image, item_name, cart_count, item_price, order_manage, item_size, item_color, order_date from order_info as OI left join item as I on (OI.item_num = I.item_num) left join member_info as MI on (OI.member_num = MI.member_num) left join cart as C on (OI.cart_num = C.cart_num) where member_id = #{member_id}

select item_image, item_name, cart_count, item_price, item_size, item_color, item_reserve, cart_num, cart_count from item as I left join cart as C on (I.item_num = C.item_num) left join member_info as MI on (C.member_num = MI.member_num) where member_id = #{member_id}
